Help the Devilish Ox

Help the Devilish Ox is a Quest in Baldur's Gate 3. Help the Devilish Ox can be acquired during Act 3. This quest can be obtained when you reach Baldur's Gate. All Baldur's Gate quests will be grouped together in your quest journal.
